attributes.action: Stop Bigamists abusing women and UK's welfare system
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign the petition and stop bigamist men abusing women, children and the UK's welfare system.
These abusing men are generally immigrants to UK, they marry Young Asian girls to obtain their visas and British passports!
They abuse their wife's and children, often leaving the emotionally, physically, & financially scarred.
They remarry from their "mother land"  inviting their new illegal wife's using false & fraudulent methods. These Bigamist DONOT support their 1st wife & children in any way, yet invite more wife's over to scourge off the UK's welfare system!
Please Prevent them from continuing  this cycle of  Family & Benefit Abuse.
Sign the petition to make tougher legislation against these men. Pleas watch following:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KGvFY0Jv9F0&feature=youtube_gdata_player
